title: Vuelta a España Stage 5: Bike Throw Makes the Difference as Pavel Bittner Denies Wout van Aert in Sevilla Sprint
content:
DSM Firmenich-PostNL's rising sprinter scoops career-topping win in photo finish as Roglič rides home safe resplendent in red.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España Stage 5: Bike Throw Makes the Difference as Pavel Bittner Denies Wout van Aert in Sevilla Sprint on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
